Text: Re Credit Policies Cc Rod attached are the Oregon Public Utility Commission Division Rules The establishment of credit is covered in section I apologize for sending the whole document however I wasnt sure if you may need other sections that relate to credit establishment Division Rules are used for the majority of PGE retail customers If you need additional information or need some deciphering of this document please contact Bruce Trout at Bruce is a manager in PGEs Customer Service Center with retail credit accountability Bill Valach Manager of Finance Hayslett Rod PM Would each of you send me a copy of your credit policies or the rules relative to granting of credit credit extended to customers I would expect that it will be in the tariff or some other regulatory document or even a charteer or license I dont need the whole document only the portion relative to credit Please fax or email to me Thanks Rod Hayslett EB FAX

Re Organization Cc Rod as a follow up to Jim Piros email this morning attached is an org chart for the PGE Finance function Let me know if you need additional information Bill Hayslett Rod PM Bill Enron corporate is looking for the names and titles of those involved in the Finance function Could you please fax me an org chart of your org this afternoon or send me an email with names and titles Thanks Rod Hayslett EB
